title: (x) brochure for construction business E. J. Horrocks - Variable {Christopher Miller}
content:
Hi m8s, can anybody tell me what font is this, tks.

 [‹ (x) Standardized Test Form - Univers, Orator, OCR {BJ Harvey, Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071203194438/http:/typophile.com/node/39593 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Zac Kyes squiffy grotesque font - similar to H&FJ Knockout {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071203194438/http:/typophile.com/node/39613 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Coca

comments.content: It’s the critically acclaimed Invisible Sans SuperUltra Thin. Though some bemoan its poor legibility, it’s a tremendous space-saver and a favorite of Alaskan residents seeking a nice winter font.
Is there a link or photo I’m missing here?
ok....site [www.titled.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20071203194438/http:/www.titled.co.uk/ "www.titled.co.uk") \> selected works\> Print \> E. J. Horrocks

It appears to be a variable of the font Variable, found here: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/madtype/variable/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071203194438/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/madtype/variable/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/madtype/variable/")

Just a guess, however.

Am I right?  
Am I right?  
Am I right?
hum......i think is a little bit condensed......do you have it?
